name: Code Zer0 (First Level)
description:
This is the first level of the game "Code Zer0," made for student work at FLCC. In this level, you are trapped in a prison, and must find a way to escape to the outside world.

Use A & D to move left and right, respectively, W to climb the ladder, and use space to jump.

Items will interact upon contact.

Team Members: Nick Reifsnyder, Mason Fooks
